scripts.imagemin: imagemin assets/images/* -o dist/assets/images && imagemin assets/images/clients/* -o dist/assets/images/clients && imagemin assets/images/logos/* -o dist/assets/images/logos && imagemin assets/images/projects/* -o dist/assets/images/projects  && imagemin assets/images/webdev-icons/* -o dist/assets/images/webdev-icons
scripts.usemin: usemin projects.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/projects.html && usemin project1.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project1.html && usemin project2.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project2.html && usemin project3.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project3.html && usemin project5.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project5.html && usemin project6.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/project6.html && usemin resume.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/resume.html && usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run copydata && npm run usemin
